title: Sentai Red Isekai de Boukensha ni Naru

alternative_titles.en: The Red Ranger Becomes an Adventurer in Another World
alternative_titles.ja: 戦隊レッド 異世界で冒険者になる

synopsis:
Tougo Asagaki was the Red Ranger in a heroic Ranger squad. During their final battle against the ultimate evil organization, he suffers a crushing defeat and resigns himself to death. That is until he finds himself reborn in an entirely different world! Embracing his new role as an adventurer, he transforms into Kizuna Red and continues his pursuit of justice, helping those in need. Enjoy this heroic tale of a Ranger becoming the protector of another world.

(Source: Comikey)
